attributes.action: make 1 premier league match & 1 champions league match a week free to air
attributes.additional_details:
in the light of bt sport winning champions leagues rights, football on tv has become a "racket". the public have to pay more and more for the same thing. i believe it would be better for the nations to share in our national game & 1 premiership game a week on terrestrial free to air tv, whether broadcast by sky or not would be good for football & society. the same goes for champions league. the clubs and broadcasters can still make money selling the extra matches on subcription to those who are keen to have even more sport.

if u support this motion please add ur e-signature before its too late
